      • toBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap toBitmap(android.net.Uri uri,
                               Integer maxWidth,
                               Integer maxHeight)
        Gets a Bitmap from a Uri. Resizes the image to a determined width and height.
        Parameters:
        uri - The Uri from which the image is obtained.
        maxWidth - The maximum width of the image used to scale it. If null, the image won't be scaled
        maxHeight - The maximum height of the image used to scale it. If null, the image won't be scaled
        Returns:
        Bitmap The resized image.

      • toPNGInputStream

        public static ByteArrayInputStream toPNGInputStream(android.net.Uri uri,
                                    Integer maxWidth,
                                    Integer maxHeight)

      • toPNGInputStream

        public static ByteArrayInputStream toPNGInputStream(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Compress the bitmap to a PNG and return its ByteArrayInputStream
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The Bitmap to compress
        Returns:
        The ByteArrayInputStream
